ApplicationData.text: Most data returned by SearchCal were collected thanks to CDS (Centre de Donnees astronomiques de Strasbourg, France).

package.name: AppleJavaExtensions
package.description: toolkit to provide better user interface on Mac, provided by Apple, Inc.

package.name: Axis
package.description: SOAP protocol stack, provided by The Apache Software Foundation.

package.name: Commons
package.description: general libraries, provided by The Apache Software Foundation.

package.name: JavaMail
package.description: platform-independent and protocol-independent framework to build mail and messaging applications, provided by Sun Microsystems, Inc.

package.name: kXML
package.description: opensource XML pull parser and writer

package.name: SAVOT
package.description: SearchCal uses source code created at the Centre de Donnees astronomiques de Strasbourg, France.

package.name: WSDL4j
package.description: opensource Web Services description language for Java toolkit.

prerelease.change: Updated acknowledgment to include involved laboratory's names.
Fixed unit conversion problem while filtering stars on RA separation.
Added white spaces as a valid separator for science object coordinates input.
Replaced custom SIMBAD resolution system with common JMMC one.
Removed legacy "Query : Get Star" menu item.
Corrected a bug that prevented I, J and H bands to be used.
Re-ordered default columns in detailled views.
Changed 'VarFlag3' column for 'VFlag' column in the detailled bright N column set.
Added spectral binary detection (from SBC9 catalog, with Multiplicity filter).
Added desktop application creation from JNLP.
Enforce use of the default Apple menu bar on Mac OS X.
Added automatic opening of '.scvot' files.
Prevent file overwritting while saving or exporting data.
Removed all references to unused CHARM catalog.
Removed all references to unused CHARM catalog.
Added a Help menu item to open SearchCal hot news RSS feed.
Added a new application icon.
Corrected diameter columns in simple bright view for N band.
Corrected visibility column in detailled bright view for N band.
Added missing F12 column in simple bright view for N band.
Changed HD and HIP cells tooltips to make explicit reference to SIMBAD.
Added user manual.
Removed unused query preference pane.
Corrected CSV and HTML export.
Workaround a known Java 1.5.0_16 bug that prevented the load of user manual.
Complete rewrite of our client as a full-featured desktop-class Java application.
Our server is now wrapped and available as a VO-compliant webservice.

ApplicationData.acknowledgment:
This research has made use of the Jean-Marie Mariotti Center \texttt{SearchCal} service \footnote{Available at http://www.jmmc.fr/searchcal} co-developped by FIZEAU and LAOG, and of CDS Astronomical Databases SIMBAD and VIZIER \footnote{Available at http://cdsweb.u-strasbg.fr/}.

I. The bright object case}", journal = {\aap}, eprint = {arXiv:astro-ph/0607026}, keywords = {instrumentation: high angular resolution, instrumentation: interferometric, stars: fundamentals parameters, catalogs, astronomical database: miscellaneous}, year = 2006, month = sep, volume = 456, pages = {789-789}, doi = {10.1051/0004-6361:20054469}, adsurl = {http://cdsads.u-strasbg.fr/abs/2006A%26A...456..789B}, adsnote = {Provided by the SAO/NASA Astrophysics Data System} }
